name: Raver Super Hero Dance Combat
description: A fusion of dance-based movement and combat techniques, integrating rhythmic flow, evasive footwork, and momentum-based striking.

workout_groups.name: Rhythmic Combat Flow (Music-Based Footwork & Reactive Striking)
workout_groups.description: Training combat footwork and striking mechanics in rhythm with breakbeats, basslines, and dynamic tempo shifts.

workouts.name: Breakbeat Flow Drills
workouts.description: Move in sync with breakbeats, switching between defensive stances and counterstrikes.

workouts.name: Footwork Cycles (Jeet Kune Do, Wing Chun)
workouts.description: Use rapid stepping cycles from JKD and Wing Chun to evade and attack in rhythm.

workouts.name: Kick-Dodge-Roll Integration
workouts.description: Choreographed sequences blending kicks, dodges, and rolls with continuous motion.

workouts.name: Capoeira Ginga into Tactical Kick Combos
workouts.description: Blend Ginga footwork with kicks, transitioning fluidly between offense and defense.

workouts.name: Bounce-Step Striking Patterns
workouts.description: Using rhythm-based bounce steps, strike on the beat and pivot between angles.

workouts.name: Bassline Shuffle Footwork
workouts.description: Use fast footwork movements to stay light on your feet in sync with bass-heavy beats.

workouts.name: Beat Drop Counterattacks
workouts.description: Time strikes with the beat drop, executing explosive counterstrikes with precision.

workouts.name: Fast-Twitch Rhythm Striking
workouts.description: Execute rapid punching or kicking combinations in sync with double-time beats.

workouts.name: Echo-Step Side Switches
workouts.description: Step laterally with rhythm-based timing to fake out opponents.

workouts.name: Cross-Rhythm Evasive Steps
workouts.description: Mix quick backsteps with lateral movement to avoid attacks while maintaining rhythmic footwork.

workouts.name: Trap Bassline Dodge-Counter Drill
workouts.description: Use low-end heavy bass rhythms as timing cues to evade and counter with precision.

workouts.name: Break-Step Knee Drive
workouts.description: Use fast steps and rhythmic knee drives to maintain offensive flow.

workouts.name: Drop Tempo Power Strikes
workouts.description: Time explosive kicks and strikes with low-tempo transitions in music.

workouts.name: Bounce-Rhythm Defense Drill
workouts.description: Maintain rhythmic bouncing while reacting to incoming strikes with blocks and evasion.

workouts.name: Spiral Rhythm Dodge-Counter
workouts.description: Spin or pivot into counters while following rhythmic cues in the music.

workouts.name: Step-Tap Rhythm Drill
workouts.description: Lightly step-tap in rhythm with a beat while maintaining balance and mobility.

workouts.name: Slow-Tempo Flow Striking
workouts.description: Perform relaxed but precise strikes while moving in time with a slower tempo beat.

workouts.name: Basic Shuffle Step Evade
workouts.description: Use side-to-side shuffle steps to dodge incoming attacks while maintaining balance.

workouts.name: Break-Step Recovery Drill
workouts.description: Step, drop low, and recover back into stance smoothly while staying in rhythm.

workout_groups.name: Circular Motion Attacks (Baguazhang, Capoeira, Taijutsu)
workout_groups.description: Developing fluid, circular combat strikes that maximize speed and evasive power.

workouts.name: Baguazhang Circle Walking Strikes
workouts.description: Move in circular footwork patterns while striking at optimal angles.

workouts.name: Capoeira Spinning Sweep Kicks
workouts.description: Execute spinning sweeps while staying in rhythm with movement.

workouts.name: Taijutsu Flow Reversals
workouts.description: Use circular redirections and counter-strikes in fluid sequences.

workouts.name: Muay Thai Arc Step Elbows
workouts.description: Step in a curved motion while throwing elbows from different angles.

workouts.name: 360-Degree Spinning Attacks
workouts.description: Perform full spin attacks while staying balanced and fluid.

workouts.name: Basic Circle Walking Footwork
workouts.description: Practice slow, controlled circular footwork to build stability and movement flow.

workouts.name: Baguazhang Arm Rotation Drills
workouts.description: Perform fluid arm rotations while maintaining circular stepping techniques.

workouts.name: Spinning Low Kicks (Capoeira Meia Lua de Compasso)
workouts.description: Use spinning low kicks to sweep an opponent while keeping balanced.

workouts.name: Taijutsu Step & Redirect Drill
workouts.description: Step in circular motions while redirecting an opponent’s energy.

workouts.name: Reverse Spinning Hook Kicks
workouts.description: Spin into a hooking kick while maintaining control and balance.

workouts.name: Silat Off-Line Step & Cut
workouts.description: Step offline and strike from an angle using circular entry attacks.

workouts.name: Capoeira Esquiva & Counter
workouts.description: Dodge in a circular motion and counterattack with a spin kick or strike.

workouts.name: Rolling Deflection Blocks (Baguazhang Arm Spirals)
workouts.description: Use rolling arm motions to deflect incoming strikes smoothly.

workouts.name: Dynamic Spin & Reverse Kick
workouts.description: Execute a spinning feint before delivering a reverse kick.

workouts.name: Taijutsu Spiral Takedowns
workouts.description: Use spiraling movements to unbalance an opponent and control the takedown.

workouts.name: Baguazhang Double Palm Strike Rotation
workouts.description: Strike using both palms while rotating around an opponent.

workouts.name: Advanced 540-Degree Spinning Kick
workouts.description: Jump into a fully committed spin, executing a 540-degree airborne kick.

workouts.name: Capoeira Aerial Spin & Counter
workouts.description: Perform a full aerial spin before landing into a defensive counterattack.

workouts.name: Advanced Baguazhang Spinning Deflections
workouts.description: Use continuous rotational movement to evade, deflect, and reposition.

workout_groups.name: Momentum-Based Combat Techniques (Redirecting Force)
workout_groups.description: Developing combat movement based on momentum redirection, sweeps, and evasive positioning.

workouts.name: Basic Weight Shift Redirects
workouts.description: Train controlled shifts in weight to prepare for advanced redirections.

workouts.name: Low Stance Step & Deflect
workouts.description: Practice stepping offline to deflect incoming force.

workouts.name: Circular Pivot Counters
workouts.description: Use momentum-based pivots to evade and counter.

workouts.name: Silat Triangle Step Repositioning
workouts.description: Reposition using triangle footwork and redirection.

workouts.name: Capoeira Spin Fake Outs
workouts.description: Use deceptive spins to mislead your opponent before striking.

workouts.name: Baguazhang Palm Redirections
workouts.description: Redirect force using fluid palm techniques in circular movement.

workouts.name: Rolling Displacement Techniques
workouts.description: Roll and reposition using controlled momentum shifts.

workouts.name: Silat Body Drop Counters
workouts.description: Drop weight at key moments to counter aggressive attacks.

workouts.name: Intercept & Redirect (Jeet Kune Do)
workouts.description: Intercept an attack and immediately redirect it into a counter.

workouts.name: Muay Thai Directional Elbow Reversals
workouts.description: Use redirection angles with elbows to neutralize incoming strikes.

workouts.name: Combat Feint & Sweep
workouts.description: Feign a strike to bait movement, then sweep with controlled momentum.

workouts.name: Capoeira Aerial Spin Redirect
workouts.description: Use an aerial spin to redirect force while counterattacking midair.

workouts.name: Baguazhang Continuous Flow Redirection
workouts.description: Move in an unbroken circular motion to evade and counterattack.

workouts.name: Silat Advanced Spin Recovery & Takedown
workouts.description: Blend spins with takedowns to flow between offense and defense.

workouts.name: Silat Sweeps & Reversals
workouts.description: Sweep opponents off balance while maintaining control of your positioning.

workouts.name: Combat Dance Transitions
workouts.description: Flow between evasion, counters, and repositioning in a musical rhythm.

workouts.name: Slip & Spin Counters (Jeet Kune Do, Wing Chun)
workouts.description: Slip past attacks while spinning into an immediate counterstrike.

workouts.name: Aikido Redirections into Counter-Strikes
workouts.description: Blend evasive redirections with rapid counterattacks.

workouts.name: Whip-Step Fake Outs
workouts.description: Fake an initial movement before using a sharp redirection.

workout_groups.name: Dance-to-Strike Transitions (Seamless Fight Sequences in Motion)
workout_groups.description: Developing seamless integration of combat moves into a fluid, dance-like fighting style.

workouts.name: Basic Rhythm Striking Steps
workouts.description: Practice simple strikes in sync with a steady rhythm.

workouts.name: Step-and-Strike Combos
workouts.description: Integrate basic stepping patterns with simple strikes.

workouts.name: Shuffle Step into Jab Cross
workouts.description: Use lateral shuffle steps to maintain mobility while striking.

workouts.name: Low-to-High Evasion Transitions
workouts.description: Drop low to evade and transition into a counterstrike.

workouts.name: Capoeira Ginga into Striking Combos
workouts.description: Seamlessly transition between evasive movement and counterattacks.

workouts.name: Footwork Sync with Fast Punches
workouts.description: Practice rapid footwork while throwing fast-paced punches.

workouts.name: Capoeira Sweep into High Kick
workouts.description: Blend sweeps into airborne kicks for deceptive power.

workouts.name: Spinning Hook Kick Flow
workouts.description: Use continuous motion to deliver multiple spinning hook kicks.

workouts.name: Silat Rolling Takedown to Counter
workouts.description: Roll into an opponent’s legs to sweep them before countering.

workouts.name: Jump-Step Elbow Strike (Muay Thai)
workouts.description: Leap forward with a skipping step to land a precise elbow strike.

workouts.name: Breakbeat Footwork with Striking Intervals
workouts.description: Match striking sequences to shifting beats.

workouts.name: Cartwheel into Back Kick
workouts.description: Use a cartwheel motion to reposition before delivering a back kick.

workouts.name: Capoeira Aerial Flip into Strike
workouts.description: Flip over an opponent’s position before counterattacking mid-air.

workouts.name: Wushu Spinning Strike Sequences
workouts.description: Blend multiple spinning attacks into a continuous rhythm.

workouts.name: Aerial Butterfly Kick into Follow-Up
workouts.description: Perform a full butterfly kick before landing a follow-up strike.

workouts.name: Breakbeat Strike Chains
workouts.description: String together rapid attacks in sync with a breakbeat rhythm.

workouts.name: Capoeira Flip-to-Kick Transitions
workouts.description: Transition from an aerial flip directly into a striking kick.

workouts.name: Low-to-High Spin Attacks
workouts.description: Start with low evasive spins and explode into high strikes.

workouts.name: Rolling Recovery to Counter Strike
workouts.description: Recover from a fall or roll and immediately strike from an unexpected angle.

workouts.name: B-boy Windmill to Strike Transitions
workouts.description: Using windmill motion to launch into rapid counterstrikes.
